abstract: Ramón Fernando Núñez Reyes (born 14 November 1985) is a Honduran footballer. Núñez plays primarily as an attacking midfielder. He can also play as a winger or as a second striker. In his homeland he is nicknamed El Principito meaning The Little Prince. In 2011, he had a loan spell at Scunthorpe United.
